description:
In an advisory issued by India’s Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) last Friday, it was declared that any AI technology still in development must acquire explicit government permission before being released to the public. Developers will also only be able to deploy these technologies after labelling the potential fallibility or unreliability of the... Read more »

The post AIs in India will need government permission before launching appeared first on AI News.
title: AIs in India will need government permission before launching
